title: President Monroe articulate the Monroe Doctrine...

content.question: President Monroe articulate the Monroe Doctrine in his 1823 address to Congress primarily in order to

choices.label: respond positively to the recent Latin American revolutions
rule out United States involvement in South America
provide a rationale for United States intervention in the Isthmus of Panama
warn European nations against further colonial ventures in the Western Hemisphere
encourage Britain to help the fledging Latin American states

content.answer: warn European nations against further colonial ventures in the Western Hemisphere

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
